nodes.bodyText: Is it possible to use sourceLocales directly without adding a new parameter: sourceLocalesStr?
Need to know the purposes of sourceLocales and sourceLocaleStr.
sourceLocales use validate the collect resource  locale， sourceLocaleStr use response String when validate false
It's strange to use argument of index 0 to judge.
the list interface not support get first method

Maybe we can use StringUtils.join directly, such as
return StringUtils.join(sourceLocaleList, ConstantsChar.COMMA + ConstantsChar.SPACING);
If sourceLocales2 is empty, don't need to verify the locale. Is this more reasonable?
To improve performance, it's better to prepare the supported locale string when application starts up.
